tool_description: API to access data from the Star Wars universe, including people, planets, films, species, starships, and vehicles.
title: Star Wars API

api_list.name: get_people
api_list.description: Fetch people resources or a specific person.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the person resource.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter people resources.

api_list.name: get_films
api_list.description: Fetch film resources or a specific film.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the film resource.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter film resources.

api_list.name: get_starships
api_list.description: Fetch starship resources or a specific starship.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the starship resource.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter starship resources.

api_list.name: get_vehicles
api_list.description: Fetch vehicle resources or a specific vehicle.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the vehicle resource.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter vehicle resources.

api_list.name: get_species
api_list.description: Fetch species resources or a specific species.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the species resource.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter species resources.

api_list.name: get_planets
api_list.description: Fetch planet resources or a specific planet.

optional_parameters.name: resource_id
optional_parameters.description: The specific ID of the planet resource.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter planet resources.
